revision.text: {{note|This page describes the flags defined in the {{c|EPrintLevel}} enum. It's mainly meant to be included into other pages that describe functions that use print levels, such as {{struct|Console}}, using the '''{{: EPrintLevel}}''' syntax. (This note will not be included.)}} :*'''{{c|PRINT_LOW}}''' — pickup messages :*'''{{c|PRINT_MEDIUM}}''' — death messages :*'''{{c|PRINT_HIGH}}''' — critical messages :*'''{{c|PRINT_CHAT}}''' — chat messages :*'''{{c|PRINT_TEAMCHAT}}''' — chat messages from a teammate :*'''{{c|PRINT_LOG}}''' — only to logfile :*'''{{c|PRINT_BOLD}}''' — a global message, such as printed with [[A_PrintBold]] :*'''{{c|PRINT_TYPES}}''' — bitmask {{moreinfo}} :*'''{{c|PRINT_NONOTIFY}}''' — do not add to notify buffer; this means the message will not be printed to the console :*'''{{c|PRINT_NOLOG}}''' — do not save to logfile :Note: logfile can be created by launching GZDoom with the -logfile mylogfile.txt [[command line parameter]]. This will write console log into a txt file of your choice (the file will be overwritten on every launch).[[Category:Include templates]]
